name: gbXML Agent
description: Calls gbXML MCP tools to list surfaces/constructions and retrieve surface properties (area, tilt, insulation), then writes results back to the blackboard.

skills.name: List Surfaces
skills.description: Enumerate all surfaces with ids and basic properties. Uses blackboard: gbxml_path. Optional: save_response_as.

skills.name: List Constructions
skills.description: Enumerate construction IDs in the file. Uses blackboard: gbxml_path. Optional: save_response_as.

skills.name: Get Surface Area
skills.description: Retrieve area (m²) for a specific surface. Uses blackboard: gbxml_path, surface_id. Optional: save_response_as.

skills.name: Get Surface Tilt
skills.description: Retrieve tilt (degrees) for a specific surface. Uses blackboard: gbxml_path, surface_id. Optional: save_response_as.

skills.name: Get Surface Insulation (R-value)
skills.description: Compute total R-value (m²·K/W) for a surface via its construction layers. Uses blackboard: gbxml_path, surface_id. Optional: save_response_as.
